text:
This is an education centre. There are many kids for afternoon classes.
I was there accompanying a friend who intended to sign up for an adult conversational class. The consultant assessed her test and recommended her to attend a paid trial class.

Teacher Ramin gave quite a good sharing of the lesson structure. However, the time set aside is too short to enable the child to experience lesson. Will be ideal to take into consideration the duration required to share about the lesson structure with parents and lesson proper. Thank you.

I had an enjoyable time with Jaki Fisher tonight for the IELTS Writing Interactive. Lesson was planned well and she has explained everything patiently & clearly. It has been a pleasure to have Jaki teach us and I have benefited from this session.
Abdul Hakeem is a wonderful advisor who was supportive, patient and helpful. His colleague at the counter was equally great at service!
Great experience, well organised and well engaged with kids and parents!
